Detailed Description
The base class of all Simple Sync networked components.
SyncObject base class with handling for frames and frame history.
Template Parameters
TFrame
The derived FrameBase class to be used as the frame.
Type Constraints
TFrame:FrameBase

Clear all frames from a different controller to avoid ghosts of old non-empty frames.

override void Photon.Pun.Simple.SyncObject< TFrame >.OnAwake ( )[virtual]
Be sure to use base.OnAwake() when overriding.
This is called when the NetObject runs Awake(). All code that depends on the NetObj being initialized should use this rather than Awake();

When overriding, but sure to keep base.Awake().
Also, frames are created and given indexes, but any other Initialization will still need to be explicitly called in the derived Awake().

Called every simulation tick, right after the frameId has been incremented by NetMaster.
Base class advances/increments all of the frame references.
Parameters
targFrameId
initialize
Returns
Base will return false if snapshot is not ready.
TODO:should this be active in hierarchy?
Invalidate old frames
Tick arrived for targFrame, but Frame may be partial, nochange or otherwise empty
No tick arrived for targFrame - attempt reconstruction using snapFrame and prevFrame
snapFrame is valid, so some kind of reconstruction of targFrame is likely possible
Unable to reconstruct invalid targFrame from invalid snapFrame
Reconstruction disabled, mark the invalid targFrame as empty
